title: I Want to Pick For You!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Ayumu-saaan! Sorry to keep you waiting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hi, Rin-chan. Let’s do our best shopping for the Christmas party!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Will do nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That coat looks great on you, by the way.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh? Really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe.... You see, Kayochin and Maki-chan picked this one for me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hanayo-chan and Maki-chan sure know what looks good on you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>They really do! That scarf looks good on you as well, Ayumu-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Thank you! That girl picked this one out for me♪ Things your close friends chose for you always end up becoming your favorite, don’t they?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
